code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useUser}from'./UserContext';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const{login,user}=useUser();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const success=login(username,password);if(success){navigate('/');}else{alert('Invalid username or password');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"auth-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),placeholder:"Username",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Password",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"auth-button",children:"Log In"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"auth-switch",children:["Don't have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:"Sign Up"})]})]});};export default Login;
